languages.text: "На твоем языке это состояние так же описывается словом "медитация". Это то, что позволяет мне поддерживать баланс внешнего и внутреннего и оберегает душу от тягот и скверны".

"In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."
languages.original_text: "На твоем языке это состояние так же описывается словом "медитация". Это то, что позволяет мне поддерживать баланс внешнего и внутреннего и оберегает душу от тягот и скверны".

traits.locale_text: "In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."

"In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."

"In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."

"In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."

languages.text: «En tu lengua, este estado también podría definirse usando la palabra "meditación". Es lo que me permite mantener un equilibrio entre el mundo exterior y mi propio mundo interior, y protege mi alma de tribulaciones y de la corrupción».
languages.original_text: "In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."

traits.locale_text: «En tu lengua, este estado también podría definirse usando la palabra "meditación". Es lo que me permite mantener un equilibrio entre el mundo exterior y mi propio mundo interior, y protege mi alma de tribulaciones y de la corrupción».

languages.text: 「あなたたちの言語で言うならば、いわゆる“瞑想”と同じ状態だ。これを行うことで、私は外界と自分の心の均衡を保つことができて、私の魂を不可や腐敗から守ることができる」
languages.original_text: "In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたたちの言語で言うならば、いわゆる“瞑想”と同じ状態だ。これを行うことで、私は外界と自分の心の均衡を保つことができて、私の魂を不可や腐敗から守ることができる」

languages.text: “在你们的语言中，这种状态也可以用‘冥想’这个词来描述。这种状态可以帮助我在外部世界和内心世界之间保持平衡，保护我的灵魂不被重担压垮，也不受腐化影响。”
languages.original_text: "In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."

traits.locale_text: “在你们的语言中，这种状态也可以用‘冥想’这个词来描述。这种状态可以帮助我在外部世界和内心世界之间保持平衡，保护我的灵魂不被重担压垮，也不受腐化影响。”

languages.text: « Dans votre langue, cet état peut se décrire par le mot "méditation". C'est ainsi que je préserve l'équilibre entre le monde extérieur et mon monde intérieur, et cela me permet également de protéger mon âme contre les fardeaux et la corruption. »
languages.original_text: "In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."

traits.locale_text: « Dans votre langue, cet état peut se décrire par le mot "méditation". C'est ainsi que je préserve l'équilibre entre le monde extérieur et mon monde intérieur, et cela me permet également de protéger mon âme contre les fardeaux et la corruption. »

languages.text: "In Eurer Sprache lässt sich dieser Zustand auch mit dem Wort 'Meditation' beschreiben. Er gestattet mir, ein Gleichgewicht zwischen der äußeren Welt und meiner inneren Welt zu wahren, und er schützt meine Seele vor Last und Korruption."
languages.original_text: "In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."

traits.locale_text: "In Eurer Sprache lässt sich dieser Zustand auch mit dem Wort 'Meditation' beschreiben. Er gestattet mir, ein Gleichgewicht zwischen der äußeren Welt und meiner inneren Welt zu wahren, und er schützt meine Seele vor Last und Korruption."

languages.original_text: "In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."

languages.text: "Bu vaziyet, senin dilindeki 'meditasyon' kelimesiyle de açıklanabilir. Dalgı, dış dünya ile iç dünyam arasında denge kurmama olanak sağlayarak ruhumu zorluklara ve yozlaşmaya karşı korur."
languages.original_text: "In your language, this state can also be conveyed with the word 'meditation.' It is what allows me to maintain a balance between the outer world and my inner world, and it guards my soul against burdens and corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Bu vaziyet, senin dilindeki 'meditasyon' kelimesiyle de açıklanabilir. Dalgı, dış dünya ile şahsi iç dünyam arasında bir denge kurmama olanak sağlayarak ruhumu zorluklara ve yozlaşmaya karşı korur."
